title: TREASURIES-U.S. yields hold at lower levels after higher Wall Street open
text:
NEW YORK, Most U.S. Treasury yields held at lower levels early Tuesday after Wall Street stock prices opened higher as fears retreated regarding a trade war between the United States and China, the world’s two biggest economies.
At 9:47 a.m. (1347 GMT), the yield on 10-year Treasury notes fell 1.6 basis points to 2.825 percent, while two-year yields fell 1.8 basis points to 2.298 percent. (Reporting by Richard Leong Editing by Chizu Nomiyama)
